docs.lead_paragraph: Pakistan tightened security in the city of Lahore ahead of a hugely anticipated final of its domestic cricket league on Sunday, pushing ahead with a rare high-profile match despite a recent spike in Islamist violence.

headline.print_headline: After Bombs, Pakistan Tightens Security for Rare Major Cricket Match
headline.main: After Bombs, Pakistan Tightens Security for Rare Major Cricket Match

docs.snippet: Pakistan tightened security in the city of Lahore ahead of a hugely anticipated final of its domestic cricket league on Sunday, pushing ahead with a rare high-profile match despite a recent spike in Islamist violence....

docs.lead_paragraph: China has cut its growth target this year as the world's second-largest economy pushes through painful reforms to address a rapid build-up in debt, and erects a "firewall" against financial risks.

headline.print_headline: China Cuts Growth Goal, Puts Focus on Reform and 'Firewall' Against Risks
headline.main: China Cuts Growth Goal, Puts Focus on Reform and 'Firewall' Against Risks

docs.snippet: China has cut its growth target this year as the world's second-largest economy pushes through painful reforms to address a rapid build-up in debt, and erects a "firewall" against financial risks....

docs.lead_paragraph: Leading Bollywood filmmaker Karan Johar said Sunday that he's become a parent to twins born via surrogate.

headline.print_headline: Indian Filmmaker Karan Johar Has Twins via Surrogate
headline.main: Indian Filmmaker Karan Johar Has Twins via Surrogate

docs.snippet: Leading Bollywood filmmaker Karan Johar said Sunday that he's become a parent to twins born via surrogate....

docs.lead_paragraph: At a circular booth in the middle of the Trump International Hotel's balcony restaurant, President Donald Trump dined on his steak — well-done, with ketchup — while chatting with British Brexit politician Nigel Farage.

headline.print_headline: Trump Hotel May Be Political Capital of the Nation's Capital
headline.main: Trump Hotel May Be Political Capital of the Nation's Capital

docs.snippet: At a circular booth in the middle of the Trump International Hotel's balcony restaurant, President Donald Trump dined on his steak — well-done, with ketchup — while chatting with British Brexit politician Nigel Farage....

docs.lead_paragraph: Former world number one Park In-bee wielded a red-hot putter on her way to a tournament-record eight-under 64 that catapulted the Korean to a one-shot victory at the HSBC Women's Champions on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Brilliant Park Storms to Victory in Singapore
headline.main: Brilliant Park Storms to Victory in Singapore

docs.snippet: Former world number one Park In-bee wielded a red-hot putter on her way to a tournament-record eight-under 64 that catapulted the Korean to a one-shot victory at the HSBC Women's Champions on Sunday....

docs.lead_paragraph: President Donald Trump turned to Congress on Sunday for help finding evidence to support his unsubstantiated claim that former President Barack Obama had Trump's telephones tapped during the election. Obama's intelligence chief said no such action was ever carried out.

headline.print_headline: Trump Enlists Congress, Ex-Intel Chief Denies Wiretapping
headline.main: Trump Enlists Congress, Ex-Intel Chief Denies Wiretapping

docs.snippet: President Donald Trump turned to Congress on Sunday for help finding evidence to support his unsubstantiated claim that former President Barack Obama had Trump's telephones tapped during the election. Obama's intelligence chief said no such action...

docs.lead_paragraph: Britain agreed on Sunday to arrange 10 billion pounds in loans to finance infrastructure projects in Iraq over a 10 year period, a program that would only benefit British companies, an Iraqi minister said in Baghdad.

headline.print_headline: Iraq to Get 10 Billion Pound Loan for British Contracts
headline.main: Iraq to Get 10 Billion Pound Loan for British Contracts

docs.snippet: Britain agreed on Sunday to arrange 10 billion pounds in loans to finance infrastructure projects in Iraq over a 10 year period, a program that would only benefit British companies, an Iraqi minister said in Baghdad....

docs.lead_paragraph: Vanderbilt did what no other member of the Southeastern Conference could do this season. The Commodores swept Florida, and that could be enough to almost guarantee an at-large bid to the NCAA Tournament.

headline.print_headline: Bubble Watch: Vandy, Wake Forest Get Big Wins
headline.main: Bubble Watch: Vandy, Wake Forest Get Big Wins

docs.snippet: Vanderbilt did what no other member of the Southeastern Conference could do this season. The Commodores swept Florida, and that could be enough to almost guarantee an at-large bid to the NCAA Tournament....

docs.lead_paragraph: More than 40,000 people have been displaced in the last week from the Iraqi city of Mosul, where U.S.-backed forces launched a fresh push towards the Islamic State-held old city center on Sunday and closed in on the main government complex.

headline.print_headline: Over 40,000 Displaced From Mosul in a Week as Iraqi Forces Near Old City
headline.main: Over 40,000 Displaced From Mosul in a Week as Iraqi Forces Near Old City

docs.snippet: More than 40,000 people have been displaced in the last week from the Iraqi city of Mosul, where U.S.-backed forces launched a fresh push towards the Islamic State-held old city center on Sunday and closed in on the main government complex....

docs.lead_paragraph: Underdog Tony Bellew stopped former WBA heavyweight champion David Haye in the 11th round of their thrilling clash at London's O2 Arena on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Underdog Bellew Stuns Haye in Heavyweight Clash
headline.main: Underdog Bellew Stuns Haye in Heavyweight Clash

docs.snippet: Underdog Tony Bellew stopped former WBA heavyweight champion David Haye in the 11th round of their thrilling clash at London's O2 Arena on Saturday....
